LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench.label: Ratkin hand tailor bench
LanguageData.RK_HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring Ratkin's clothes by hand. Works at 65% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench.label: Ratkin electric tailor bench
LanguageData.RK_ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of Ratkin's clothes. Can work without electricity at 65% of normal speed.
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy.label: Ratkin fueled smithy
LanguageData.RK_FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical Ratkin's weapons and tools.
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy.label: Ratkin electric smithy
LanguageData.RK_ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical Ratkin's weapons and tools.
